title: Internship
text: I was in a team developing an app to assist football coaches in better management of data. We worked on a functional web app with important features such as focused football match analysis and report, practical and intuitive UI design and engaging visualizations

title: International Smart Industry
text: Took courses in different areas such as Smart Industry Information Systems and digitalisation exercises in the International Smart Industry to improve my competence.

title: Website Seller
text: Developing and selling WordPress based websites 100 % positive feedback with 178 transactions totaling $16,417
